name: Machop
flavorText:
Loves to build
its muscles.
It trains in all styles of martial
arts to become
even stronger.

previous.name: Alakazam
previous.flavorText:
Its brain can out­
perform a super­
computer. Its intelligence
quotient is said
to be 5,000.

next.name: Machoke
next.flavorText:
Its muscular body
is so powerful, it
must wear a power save belt to be
able to regulate
its motions.

pokemon.name: Machop
pokemon.flavorText:
Loves to build
its muscles.
It trains in all styles of martial
arts to become
even stronger.

pokemon.name: Machoke
pokemon.flavorText:
Its muscular body
is so powerful, it
must wear a power save belt to be
able to regulate
its motions.

pokemon.name: Machamp
pokemon.flavorText:
Using its heavy
muscles, it throws
powerful punches that can send the
victim clear over
the horizon.
